title: European Epilepsy Academy: Temporal Lobe Epilepsy in Children
abstract: The European Epilepsy Academy announces a teaching course on Temporal Lobe Epilepsy in Children, to take place on Wednesday 14 April 1999 at the 10th Bethel-Cleveland Clinic Epilepsy Symposium and also an educational course/seminar on Comprehensive Care/Integral Epileptology in Childhood at the Epilepsy Centre Bethel in Bielefeld, Germany, 5–10 October, 1999. Information on both can be obtained from Mrs Verena Hézser-v. Wehrs, EUREPA Secretariat, Maraweg 21, D-33617 Bielefeld, fax +49 521 144 4311, eurepa@owl-online.de
